Cleen Beauty White Clay Face Bar

Brand: Cleen Beauty

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: SODIUM PALMATE, SODIUM PALM KERNELATE, AQUA (WATER, EAU), GLYCERIN, SODIUM GLUCONATE, KAOLIN (WHITE CLAY), AVENA SATIVA (OAT) KERNEL EXTRACT, SIMMONDSIA CHINENSIS (JOJOBA) SEED OIL, BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER, SODIUM CHLORIDE, PALM ACID, PALM KERN

PALM ACID, PALM KERNEL ACID, CITRIC ACID, CI 77891 (TITANIUM DIOXIDE)

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Cancer, Use Restrictions; LOW: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
